description: Replaces the default VS Code text-to-speech with F5-TTS-MLX for natural-sounding voice output in Copilot Chat.

f5Speech.pythonPath.description: Path to the Python interpreter with f5-tts-mlx installed.

f5Speech.serverPort.description: Port for the local F5-TTS server.

f5Speech.refAudioPath.description: Path to a reference audio file (mono, 24kHz WAV, 5-10s) for voice cloning. Leave empty for default voice.

f5Speech.refText.description: Transcript of the reference audio for voice cloning.

f5Speech.quantization.description: Model quantization level (4-bit or 8-bit) for lower memory usage.

f5Speech.autoStart.description: Automatically start the TTS server when VS Code launches.
